tasks.label: msys2 update check on Windows Docker container
tasks.command: docker run --rm mizarjp/winci-msys2:latest C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -lc 'pacboy --needed --noconfirm -Syuup toolchain:m clang:m openblas:m base-devel: msys2-devel:'

tasks.label: msys2 install build-deps on local
tasks.command: cmd /c msys2_shell.cmd -here -defterm -no-start -lc 'pacboy --needed --noconfirm -Syuu toolchain:m clang:m openblas:m base-devel:'

tasks.label: msys2 full-build on Windows Docker container
tasks.command: cmd /c docker run --rm --isolation=process -v %cd%:C:\YaneuraOu mizarjp/winci-msys2:latest powershell C:\YaneuraOu\script\msys2_build.ps1

tasks.label: andk full-build on Windows Docker container
tasks.command: cmd /c docker run --rm --isolation=process -v %cd%:C:\YaneuraOu mizarjp/winci-andk:latest powershell C:\YaneuraOu\script\android_build.ps1

tasks.label: linux full-build on Ubuntu Docker container
tasks.command: cmd /c docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/data mizarjp/linuxci-ubuntu bash /data/script/linux_build.sh

tasks.label: linux (target: avx2) build on Ubuntu Docker container
tasks.command: cmd /c docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/data mizarjp/linuxci-ubuntu bash /data/script/linux_build.sh -t '*avx2'
